query: SELECT s.id, s.sequenceId, s.stepOrder, s.stepType, s.message, s.subject, s.waitMinutes, seq.name as sequenceName FROM automation_steps s JOIN automation_sequences seq ON s.sequenceId = seq.id WHERE seq.`trigger` = 'new_lead' AND seq.isActive = 1 ORDER BY s.sequenceId, s.stepOrder
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aYsLc9eZnrL9DEu.root --database bGed8yr8ACVWMUwug5SgAL --execute SELECT s.id, s.sequenceId, s.stepOrder, s.stepType, s.message, s.subject, s.waitMinutes, seq.name as sequenceName FROM automation_steps s JOIN automation_sequences seq ON s.sequenceId = seq.id WHERE seq.`trigger` = 'new_lead' AND seq.isActive = 1 ORDER BY s.sequenceId, s.stepOrder
